shared.model.map

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.MapModel

  • public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map Model stores all information about the map. This data includes information about hexes, edges, vertices, and the robber. Location data is stored in a X, Y grid format.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

        p2 - The second end point.

      • GetEdge

        public Edge GetEdge(Coordinate p1,
                    Coordinate p2)
             throws MapException
        Gets the edge associated with the two end points. The order of the points does not matter.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The coordinate of the first point.
        p2 - The coordinate of the second point.
        Returns:
        The associated edge.
        Throws:
        MapException - Thrown if the edge doesn't exist
